values:
Dear Sarah,

Every human being has this thing in their head, it's grey and squishy. They call it a brain. I know you don't know much about it, seeing as you haven't used it in a loooong time, but trust me when I say it's a useful tool.

It helps you understand how ridiculous it is when your boyfriend who you haven't been with for more than three months asks you to marry him. If you used your brain, you would have said no first.



As a side note, people who can't use their brain properly are called "insane", or "mentally retarded".


Maybe you're both. I don't know, I'm not a doctor. But one thing I do know is that you need to use your brain more often. Think about things before you do them,
and stop being so fucking stupid, you insane retard.

I went to Moe's with Leener and Keri.


WELCOME TO MOE'S!


I can't believe they actually say that shit.


Anyway, it tasted good. The meat did. And the chips. I traded with Leener. She took my regulars and gave me red and black ones. Keri sat there and got text messages. Oh, excuse me; "TXT MSGS"


...
...
...



...





So then we went to Staples.







It was sketchy.

The taco is nothing more than a corn tortilla folded around a filling such as meat and cheese. It is a delectable meal and is enjoyed mostly throughout North America.

It tastes fucking awesome.


Thank you, and goodnight.

Got a PSP on the 24th when it came out.


Two words;


HOLY SHIT.


This thing is amazing. I'd write more but it's like, almost 3 am?


Going to sleep? 

Hah. Playing PSP, bitch.

YOUR LIFE____

[x] also: Tempest, Toad, Uchiha
[x] sex: Yes?
[x] status: Taken. Back off.
[x] occupation: Deli Clerk
[x] nationality: Irish, Canadian, American

____REWIND____
[x] most memorable memory: Meeting Stephanie
[x] worst? Half my childhood
[x] first word uttered: Kill
[x] first girlfriend ever?: Not important.

____FAST FORWARD____
[x] college planning to go: No plans yet
[x] future resident of: Toronto, Canada
[x] wedding: Marrying Steph
[x] children: Not sure
[x] looking forward to: Living with the woman I love
[x] NOT looking forward to: Death.

____right now____

[x] Listening: Nothing
[x] Talking to: Steph and Keri

[x] craving: Human flesh
[x] thinking of: Steph
[x] hating: Evil people. Not evil like kids use it, I mean real evil. People who don't deserve to live. I have a few in mind.

____LOVE?____

[x] love or lust?: Love
[x] best love song: Hmm... As lovers go, probably.

[x] turn offs: Stupid people, annoying people.

Merry Christmas.

Vodka and lemonade can really fuck up a Christmas night.

Lies... I can't fucking stand the lies anymore.

Soon enough, they'll push me over the edge.

They'll wish they never started drinking once they've broken my sanity.


One more time and he's in the hospital.

My LiveJournal Trick-or-Treat Haul
Uchiha_Tempest goes trick-or-treating, dressed up as Uchiha Sasuke.
arghidontknow gives you 8 green apple-flavoured jelly beans.
pure_snow89 gives you 18 pink mint-flavoured hard candies.
pyrefly_light gives you 4 mauve orange-flavoured gummy worms.
uzumaki_bullet gives you 11 tan lemon-flavoured pieces of taffy.
x1hellzangel6x gives you 8 orange tropical-flavoured pieces of taffy.
x6lilirishgal9x tricks you! You get a block of wood.
x_hinata_x tricks you! You get a toothbrush.
Uchiha_Tempest ends up with 49 pieces of candy, a block of wood, and a toothbrush.
Go trick-or-treating! Username:
Another fun meme brought to you by rfreebern.

I'm home from Canada.

I wish I never had to come home. She was beautiful. Every day I saw her, she looked even more amazing then the day before. Half the time, we didn't need to speak. Being in each others arms was all we needed. As each day came to an end, we'd look at each other and tell each other how much we didn't want me to go home. We were constantly joined all three days. Holding hands, or just hugging. Nothing else mattered.

Saying goodbye was too hard. I tried so hard not to cry in front of her. The second she left my sight I cried for hours. Driving to the plane, flying on the plane, getting off the plane, and even now as I'm writing.

I can't finish this entry now.

I'm not going to beat around the bush or be subliminal about it.

Sean, stop with your bull shit.

Everyone is sick of it. Try getting your own life instead of messing with other people. Just cause you got dumped for being a bad boyfriend doesn't mean you have to make other people look bad. You're pissing more people off than you know, so it would be wise if you backed down.

Just to let you know, no one talked me into this. I'm choosing to say this with my gift of free will.


So, prophet. Foresee this; You WILL get fucked up if it continues.


You're a joke.



Fuck you.

I had the worst day at work yesterday and was too tired to write about it then.

I covered for Rafael cause he needed to do something friday. I took his six hour shift, thinking that Junior would be in later to help me close, which I had no idea how to do. turns out he never showed up, so I was alone. I had to clean the entire deli, deal with all the customers, and close down everything by myself. Keep in mind I haven't the slightest clue what I'm doing. No one taught me how to close before. I was screwed. I was so busy with customers and cleaning that I didn't even get to take my break. In fact, I ended up leaving 15 minutes late. And with Brad shopping for food after, we ended up getting home at ten thirty, giving me no time to talk to my Cutie. I was too tired and exhausted to even tell her anything. I was also cranky cause I worked six hours straight without sitting down once or having my break.

The only thing that was going through my head was "I'm not even supposed to be here today!"


Go watch Clerks. Great movie.


Now I need to call in sick cause my legs don't work anymore. Excuse me while I crawl to the phone.

1. Confirm your identity: Todd, Toad, Tempest, Forte, Trunks, either one, really.
2. How many years have you been on the planet? About 18 and a half?
3. What are three phrases you use at least daily? Hiya, shiny, I love Steph
4. Are you a survey addict? Hells naw.
5. Do you have an online journal that you use regularly? Semi-regularly
6. Are you one of those people that are constantly applying lotion and/or chapstick? Nope.
7. Name any mental disorders you have been diagnosed with: All of them.
8. Ever freeze anyone's underwear? Technically I threw it outside and it froze over a few days.
9. Name one thing you only do/act like/wear/etc.? No idea.
10. Would you consider yourself random? Spinnach, anyone?
11. Do you have clothes hanging in your closet that still have the tags on them? Even god doesn't know what lurks in my closet.
12. Do you doodle all over your papers/homework/books? All the time.
13. Do you write down phone messages/notes on your hands? Nope.
14. What do you think of those Kidz Bop commercials? I hate them with a passion.
15. What CDs in your collection are you ashamed to admit you own? Nope, I only buy things I like.
16. Got any toe socks? Nope.
17. Do you find that you rub off on your friends more, or vice versa? I don't like rubbing other people.
18. What time is it? 9:34pm
19. Does anybody really know what time it is? Retarded question.
20. Does anybody really care? Some people do, like the white rabbit. He's late for a very important date.
21. Who sings that song, anyway? Don't know, don't care.
22. Do you untie your shoelaces before taking them off? After killing many pairs of sneakers I learned it makes them last longer. So yes.
23. Ever have random hallucinations? Yep. Fevors when I was a kid, my whole house was a jungle.
24. Ever take your pet for a walk? What pet?
25. Have you ever loved someone so much it made you cry? Hi Steph~
26. How much do you sleep? I usually sleep until I wake up.
27. Do you think staying at home and raising the kids is primarily "women's work"? No.
28. What do you think about gay marriage? I see nothing wrong with it. Ask Frank that question.
29. Do blondes annoy you in general? Nope.
30. Ever done illegal drugs? Nope.
31. Do you smoke? Never.
32. Have sex? 
33. Yell at your parents? Hell yeah.
34. Compete with your siblings? I compete with my brothers.
35. Think you got enough love as a child? Didn't know what love was as a child.
36. Listen to pop music? Nah, maybe at work, but I don't have a choice. I almost wrote cheese but I didn't.
37. Out of your own, what's your favorite lotion/ body wash/ cream/ perfume/ cologne/ etc.? Axe. *hops on an elevator with Steph.*
38. Why do fools fall in love? Cause.
39. Why is the sky blue? Atmosphere and shit. Look, I'm not here to give you answers to your next test, go look it up.
40. Did you know that your metabolism slows down at night; so if you have a midnight snack you will probably gain weight in the morning? Duh.
41. Are you going to have an open casket funeral? Depends. If I die peacefully, yes. If I die mangled in some sort of car wreck or something, yes.
42. Do you bruise easily? Bruise? Ha! 
43. Does death fascinate you? Only when I'm supplying it.
44. Ever dated someone five years older (or more) than you? No way.
45. Ever dated someone five years younger (or more) than you? Not even.
46. What's with all the black rappers right now having such terrible teeth? They're to "gangsta" to care about Dental Hygene
47. What was the whole "rosebud" thing all about? What the f...
48. How many people do you think would come to your funeral? Not sure.
49. Are you wondering why I'm still on the death thing? Not really
50. Who said this: "Death, taxes, and childbirth. There's never a convenient time for any of them.": You did, just now.
51. Have you ever contributed to someone's death? This one time, I was on an assassination mission with Keri...
52. What Hollywood celebrity annoys you the most? All of them.
53. What do you think about school? It exists.
54. Are you addicted to the internet? Nah.
55. Do you have those little white vitamin deficiency marks on your fingernails? No?
56. Dog person or cat person? Cat person. El Gato.
57. What do you take when you have a headache? Nothing, I deal with it.
58. What's your alcoholic drink of choice? Don't drink.
59. Is "settling down" a major priority for you (meaning; married, good job, spending your extra money on new curtains and mowing the lawn on weekends)? Yeah, me and Steph have talked about it already.
60. Do you have a calendar/datebook? Nope.
61. Was "Beaches" as good a movie as everyone says it is? Watch it yourself, I'm not your bitch.
62. Physically, are you usually cold or warm? Warm.
63. Socially, are you usually cold or warm? Cold.
64. Ever been so depressed that you don't shower, do the dishes, clean up anything, answer your phone or move from your couch for more than a couple days? Once.
65. When you hear the scientific term "the big bang", do dirty thoughts come to mind? Yep.
66. Do you ever walk by someone and they go, "how are you?" and you go, how are you?"....and you keep on walkin'? All the time.
67. Wouldn't you rather we all just avoid eye contact and not say anything at all? No, looking at someone in the eyes establishes a connection, right Sarah?
68. Ever do volunteer work? Yep.
69. Do you think community service should really be given as a punishment for criminals? Sure, they should wear dresses too.
70. Do you shoplift? All the time back in the day.
71. Ever worked so hard that you cried? Nah.
72. What if God was one of us? Just a slob like one of us?
73. Who sings that song? Dr. Evil.
74. Are you old enough to remember the commercial with little old lady saying "where's the beef?" Barely.
75. Finish this sentence: "My kingdom for a/an ________.": Danish.
76. Do you remember the Care Bear craze? Uh huh.
77. How about when Oprah was fat? Yeah.
78. Remember Pogs? I had like, a million of those things.
79. Remember when that gymnast sprained her ankle in the summer Olympics, 1996? Yeah.
80. Remember what you were doing yesterday at this time? Talking to my Cutie.
81. Do you love shoes? They keep my feet from harm.
82. What shampoo do you use? The kind that cleans hair.
83. How do you feel right now? Bored.
84. Do you let dogs lick your face? Nope.
85. Do you subscribe to Playgirl or Playboy? Don't need to.
86. What are you doing right now besides filling out this survey? Talking to my sis.
87. What year were you born? 1985
88. Do you rule that year? What?
89. Do you paint your nails? Which ones, the ones in my wall?
90. What's your hair length? Short.
91. When did you get a cut/trim last? Last friday.
92. Do you have hoity-toity relatives, or trailer trash relatives? Yep.
93. Would you consider yourself to have an innovative mind? Yeah.
94. Has an old man/woman ever flirted with you? Maybe.
95. Ever written a survey like this? Nope.
96. Would you ever consider dating someone who'd been in prison? Nope.
97. Are you worth crying over? No.
98. Do you know anyone who's drowned? I've almost drowned countless times.
99. Would you rather have a one-on-one conversation or go to a party? One on one.
100. Do you feel better after purging all this random information from your system? Indifferent.

I haven't updated in a long ass time. I guess it's time, huh?

Let's see, new happenings... Ah, none! No wonder I haven't updated. I have money now, I guess that's new. I haven't spent a penny of it though. I need to save my money to get an apartment with my bro (Chris) and my brother (Brad). I can almost guarantee I'll have my cut of the money before them, since I don't spend any. I don't know about Chris, but Brad can't save money if his life depended on it. Anyway, I'm up so early cause I have to go to work in a few hours. 

So, any new plans? None that are new, but I can put one of my old plans into action soon. Once I have enough money for my cut of the money for the apartment, I can save up to see Steph. God, I can't wait. Part of me wants to just spend the money I have now and go see her as soon as I can. And by part of me, I mean all of me. I love her too much to be so far away. In a few years I can have enough money to get started on moving to Toronto too. Then I'll get my own place there with Steph after a while, and then talk about marriage. Seems like a lot to do and so far away. Sounds like a lot of work too. But I don't care. I'd do anything to be with her, and give up everything if I had to. I can't explain enough about how much I love her. I could go on for hours about how much I love her and it would still only be a fraction of how I feel.

Anyway, before I go writing for hours and end up late for work, I should close this at some point.

I saw Spider-Man 2 recently, it kicked ass.
I might chill with Dontel next week. It's been a while since we've chilled.
I need to chill with Keri, Nikki, and Kristin (Sister, Nicholas and Kristout) some time soon.
I need to beat Four Swords with Chris and Brad.

Okay, I guess that's it for now, I have to finish getting ready for work.

My brother left for work earlier. He put on two dirty socks and didn't change his underwear or take a shower. How can you do that? Yuck, dude.

Oh hell yes.

I finally got the job I applied to. I now work in the Deli at Stop and Shop on Lincoln street. It's hard, but I need the money, so I'll do my best. My trainer, Nate, is pretty cool, so I feel kind of comfortable there. I have to cut meats and cheeses and stuff, which is easy. Knowing what meat or cheese is what isn't. I'm constantly asking Nate what meat is what or what the code is for this or that. It's hard, but worth it.

None of that matters. My goal is to save up enough money so I can get my own apartment, then visit Steph. That's all I care about. I need to see Steph. That's the whole point of this job.

Anyway, I should get to sleep, since I have a long day of sleep ahead of me, and I need some rest for that.

Well today I woke up at 1:00, put on some clothes and bolted out the door to run to school, the last place I want to be. So I went there to give Sami her forehead protector, then went right home after that. 

The second I walk in the door, I'm off to the dentist. Which did NOT go well at all. I need a lot of work done to fix the monstrosity that is my mouth. So after X ray things stabbing my gums, and getting stabbed by random tools in my mouth, I went home. 

I had about ten minutes to rest before the guy at Stop and Shop called. He basically told me I had the job. He told me to go to orientation tomorrow and meet with him Wednesday. 

Then I sat down, and tried to kill time before 7:00 where I could talk to my Cutie. So I played Capcom vs SNK for a while.

I talked to my Cutie, got my much needed happiness and joy for the day, then she had to leave at 11, as usual. God, how I hate 11:00. 

My Cutie introduced me to Full Metal Alchemist (FMA), A kick ass anime. I hate how I'm addicted to it. She started sending the second episode today, which I looked forward to. There was only enough time to get half of it though. 

When Steph had to go, I took out my aggression and hatred of 11:00 in Halo, where I ended up kicking ass.

I decided to look for some Resident Evil Outbreak 2 screenshots and stumbled across something interesting. 







Everything I did today made me think of Steph.






I love her so much.

My entry starts from last night.

Me and Maggie found two vodka bottles in my mother's bedroom. For those of you who don't know, we made my mother and her boyfriend promise not to bring any more alcohol into the house over four months ago. This is the third time we've found bottles since the promise.

For those who are unfamiliar with the concept, I will post the definition.

Promise- A declaration assuring that one will or will not do something; a vow.

Now, they obviously don't know what one is, since they've broken promises over and over. My mother has been breaking promises since I was born. 

So when we found them, we put them on the kitchen counter. That wasn't enough for me. I took three little post-it notes and wrote the following words:

FUCK YOU LIARS

Then around 1 or 2 in the morning they come home, my mom wakes me up and says "Where the fuck was that?"

I simply told her "Get the fuck out of my room." Which I had to repeat, since she didn't listen to first time.

Later I go out into the kitchen to find the liars talking. John, my mother's boyfriend, asks me "So you went in my room, huh? Not too happy about that." I told them I wouldn't need to check the damn room if I could trust them. My mother then says "we haven't had a drink in months!" 

(Reminder: I'm talking the whole time, calmly, while they're yelling. We live in an apartment building, these fucking morons never take it into consideration.)

John loves to push my buttons, swearing and acting like a child to -what looks like- purposely piss me off. So I told him to calm down before he makes me mad. So he pulls out his line he uses every time we get into a confrontation: "I'm not scared of you, little man." Keep in mind he's stuttering and shaking from head to toe while saying it. Last time I pushed him on his ass and broke the dishwasher. 

After taunting me, he runs off to his room. My mother won't let me talk to her, so she keeps interrupting me with her nervous excuses which are obviously false. I told her if her boyfriend keeps it up, he's going to get hurt. Most times he throws the first attack, and I'm forced to defend myself. So my mother is crying and flipping out, in an attempt to make me feel guilty and end the conversation, like she's done every time she knows she's wrong. I told her it wouldn't work this time. While I'm in mid sentence, she runs off to her room, slams her door, and locks it. They were so nervous that they forgot to take the key out of the lock. I unlocked it and told her I wasn't done. so she runs out into the living room again so we're away from John, who seemed to find the whole ordeal funny. Seeing him smiling and laughing in this situation made me shake with anger. So I tore those stupid beads from the hall down, grabbed my CD player, and my knife, and left the house. I walked around the neighborhood for a while, not sure how long. I went to my rock and thought about everything. Two spanish kids I could hear behind me were trying to break into a car, but gave up. I was hidden in the shadows of the trees surrounding my rock, so they didn't see me. After a while I went back in the building and out of the rain, not ready to go back home. I walked around the building for another while longer. When I went back into the house, I found out Maggie yelled at Brad for not stopping me. She was worried about me. 
She doesn't need to worry about me, I can take care of myself. Brad and Maggie both assumed I grabbed my knife on the way out. I don't know why they'd assume that, but oh well.

When I came home, I watched a little TV with Maggie, then went to sleep. 




I woke up this morning to find that my body was sore everywhere, and my stomach and head feel like they've been pounded on with a sledge hammer. I kept my mind off of it all day, took a nap, and here I am. My stomach and head are still killing me, and my body is still sore.



After all that, all I want to do now is talk to Stephanie. She'll make me feel perfect again, and she'll talk some sense into me, even if she doesn't know it.

I miss Steph so much already. She's at an anime convention for tonight and I won't be able to talk to her. What really sucks is that we would have been able to voice chat all night since my brother was working til midnight. 
I miss her... Wish I was with her right now. It hurts.

If anyone ever tells you love is easy, they're wrong. When you're in as deep as me, it hurts to go without the one you love for even a day..

I hope I get to talk to her soon and see how everything went.. 

I hope she's having fun right now.

I think I need to pay my rock a visit. 
(No one but Steph knows about my rock. It's a place I go to think about stuff and be alone.)





So anyway, time for my day.
I woke up to my mom telling me Sami called at 7:00. She gives me the phone and it's beeping in my ear. "Please hang up and try your call again." I went back to sleep and grunted at whatever my mom was trying to tell me. I woke up later to find my brother on the computer, I talked to him about Naruto while still half asleep, and noticed I wasn't wearing a shirt when I became conscious. Then I went online to see if my Cutie was on when Brad went to work. She wasn't, so I sat there thinking about her for about an hour and listened to music. 
I made a new icon at some time between now and yesterday.
I then called Chris to get my memory card back so my sister can play Naruto- Narutimett Hero.
After running up the hill to his house and running back, I got on the computer, hoping to see my honey online, but she wasn't. I vegged out and watched my sister play Naruto, thinking about Steph the whole time. 
Then something that pissed me off came into my mind, so I played Unreal Tournament 2004, which is a shooting game I play to get aggression and anger out, while entertaining my bored mind in the process. After playing that for a while, constantly checking to see if Steph was on, I just chilled and listened to music.


By the way, if you hear about an 18 year old male from massachusetts killing his mom and her boyfriend, tell them I was with you for the day.

The following is my wishlist of Naruto items.

1. Sharingan Eye Contacts.

2. Jounin Gloves.

3. Uchiha Clan Patch.

4. Ninja Sandals.

5. Leg Holster.

6. Kunai.

7. Pouch.

8. Cursed Seal temporary Tatoo- (Maybe get a real one later, hehe.)

 

That's it for now. I have two types of forehead protectors already, (Black and Blue) and I might get the Satin one later.

Alright, I woke up a little late this morning, felt like I swallowed the desert, so I decided to go back to sleep and say "screw it" to periods 1-3. So I got to school at the end of third and found out I don't get credit for the day, but I had a quiz in psychology to take anyway, so I stayed. (I'm not a complete moron like everyone thinks.)

While getting ready for school I couldn't find my belt. What did I do? I tied my forehead protector around my waist and went to school like that. Looked pretty damn cool, too. So then I went home, talked to my Cutie, played some Capcom vs SNK, then went online. 

Steph has a ton of work to do and I feel really bad. If I lived closer I'd be helping her right now. I'm definitely moving to Canada once I get enough money... I can't stand to be so far away from Steph, it's driving me insane more and more every day. All I want is to be with her and make her happy.

Anyway, I'm currently worrying about Steph since she's so exhausted, and she has a ton of work to do. If I were with her I'd make her go to bed and I'd do the work for her. I wish I could.

So what's been on my mind all day... Steph, of course. She always is, no matter what I'm doing. She's so beautiful, and everything about her is cute.

I should stop writing now before I end up writing a book...

Anyway, I'm out for now.

I love you, Steph.

I'd like to advise anyone who checks out my journal to check out http://www.narutonite.com 

It's not really done yet, but they're working on it. Just check it out and see if you like it. I'm sure they'll be adding tons of Naruto stuff, and prizes and such.

Last night I couldn't sleep so I played Capcom VS SNK EO on Xbox live for a few hours. Of course the only people who challenged me to fight are SS (top) ranked fighters. I still managed to beat some of them though, even though they used cheap tricks to fight me. 

Anyway, going to my dad's again today. Darryl is going to stay at my house while I'm gone again. I never get to chill with him anymore. Oh well.. I have to get ready to go to my dad's so I'm out for now.

I made myself a new icon. I'm proud of myself, since I don't usually make moving ones. 
That would be Itachi from the anime series Naruto. 
Steph just sent me a new Melody song, which I like. Thanks hun. 

So someone keeps IMing me and putting me through a ton of guilt that I don't need. It's getting annoying, seeing how she does it all the time, and doesn't get a clue that it upsets me.

So anyway, no new news today, except the new episode of Naruto totally kicked ass.

I might chill with my brother Darryl tomorrow, not sure yet.

That's all for now, I'll update later if there's any "breaking news."



P.S. I love you, Steph.

Today I wore my forehead protector to school, on my arm. I had to work alone in horticulture though, but I got a lot of work done. I had to work with Dan though, which is hard since he's retarded, and not very safe to work with. I had to mow the lawn near the greenhouse and til some soil in the flower beds. When school got out, I played Xbox Live with Chris for a while until he came over. We went to Gamestop and got Tetris and Clone Wars to play with him. 

Throughout the whole day I couldn't stop thinking about Steph. I mean constantly. So when I finally got online I was so happy to finally talk to her. I told her about my day and after that, I tried my best to make her feel special. I hope it worked. I didn't want 11:00 to come, she always has to go at 11:00. I hate all clocks that contain 11:00. It's the most depressing part of my day, since my Cutie is taken away from me at that time. I usually go to bed right when she leaves, then dream about her all night. That doesn't sound like a bad idea. I think I'll go dream about the love of my life now, see you tomorrow when I'll write more about the girl I love.

I love you, Stephanie.

I'm feeling really bad, my head is killing me, I can't stop my arms from shaking, and I can't keep my head up. 

Steph was worried about me so she's sending me to bed. She was so worried about me... I'm sorry, hun. Thank you for being here for me once again. I can always count on you to take care of me.

Thanks.. I love you so much.

Today in school, I was learning about some neat stuff in physics, when the principal announced that they recently received a bomb threat. Yeah. So we evacuated the building and went to the football field. Me and Dontel walked around a bit and talked to a few people. Then we had to go in way too fast. I doubt they had time to check the whole building for bombs. So at that point me and Dontel dismissed ourselves, went home, and I witnessed Dontel's first mistake of many.

He challenged me to a match in Perfect Dark. After completely destroying him in a final score of 20 to 1, he made his next mistake.

He actually had the guts to say he can beat me in Smash Brothers Melee. 

I laughed at first, then saw he was serious. I put the game in, gave him two level nine (highest difficulty) computer partners in a team against me. Three on one. After destroying him in record time, without losing even one life, he made one last mistake.

He claimed he could beat me in Halo. The very game I introduced him to and trained him in. Unfortunately I don't own Halo anymore, but I have a sudden urge to buy it again so I can embarrass him once again. 

Dontel loves to talk shit, even when he sucks at a game. So when I completely decimate him in a game, he usually shuts up about that game for a while.

Dontel has no idea who he's picking these fights with. If anyone has any last words to say to him, say them now. He's going to be hurting pretty bad with all the claims he's been making about his skill in games.

I had to get this out before I left for bed...

Steph, you're amazing.
When I'm in a bad mood, you can instantly cheer me up, when I'm depressed over something, you're always right there for me. You make me feel important, special, or like I have a purpose. 
I'm always thinking about you every moment of every day, and I couldn't be happier. You're constantly on my mind, even when I sleep. At night, I have all these dreams about you, and how things could be in the future.
Without you my days would be cold and dark. I can't imagine life without you now that I know how great it is.
I always think about how lucky I am to have met someone like you. I think about it every day. 
I didn't know what love was before I met you. I thought I did, but you've shown me how good it feels. I've never felt the way I feel about you. There are lots of feelings you've shown me that I never felt before. You're the most amazing person I've ever met... 
I hope we can be together forever, Steph. I love you with all my heart and soul.

Then there were ninja fights.

Okay, so I was having this really strange dream last night.

Me and Dontel were in school, and we came across a wing in the school that we've never seen before. It was abandoned, and full of kids skipping class. So we go down there, there's gambling, people riding bikes, skateboarding, playing arcade games, you name it.

So me and Dontel get to the end of this wing where there's a garage door leading outside, when suddenly from down the hall we came from we see a hooked up white car jump over a fence. In the hall, yeah...

On the hood in shiny letters, was written "Gangsta lyfe", and who comes out of the car? None other than this old lady who teaches the special ed classes at school. What the hell?

Me and Dontel looked at the car, then I woke up. But I can tell you this; This car was hooked up!

So I woke up, and my day commenced.

I played some Metal Gear Solid, beat it twice, got both endings, then went with my bro  to get roses and cards for my ma for mothers day.
